name: Rocky Way
description:
Work your way through dirt and stones to find   all the hidden treasures.

If you don´t know how to get out of the first area, here is the solution:

https://twitter.com/RisingfoxG/status/1367138189631193092

Controls:
WASD - move
Space - Jump
1,2,3 - Tools
Left Click - Action
Escape -Settings
F - pick up

Made in less then 72 hours for the Wowie Game Jam.

Check out my Youtube channel for more Game Development-related content:

https://t.co/efH6SAClAy?amp=1

ambience sounds: Freesound.org

Assets used: - Procedural Sky - Pinwheel Studio
- First Person View 3 - Drunken Lizard Games
- Realistic FPS Pack (Muzzleflash/Impacts) - Kobra Game Studios
- Footsteps Sound Pack - Cafofo
- Toon Crystals Pack - ClayManStudio
- FREE Stylized PBR Textures Pack - Lumo-Art 3D
- Vegetation Spawner - Staggart Creations
